title: OCEAN VIEW~~CONEY ISLAND'S FINEST~~3 MONTHS FREE~~~SPACIOUS CLOSETS~~~

"CONEY ISLAND'S FINEST GROSS PRICE LISTED~~ GROSS PRICE LISTED~~ 3 MONTHS FREE ON", 'A 12 MONTH LEASE WHICH NETS $1811 This M~A~R~V~E~L~O~U~S One Bedroom with Chic and stylish apartments that define oceanfront living in New York City.', 'Residences come with elegant finishes and a choice of exclusive terraces and balconies, giving you all the living space you need with fresh, functional, and modern design.', 'Spacious homes with plenty of natural light.', 'White oak floors, oversized windows, and solar shades in every unit.', 'Smartly-designed kitchens with Silestone Pearl Jasmine countertops and white lacquer cabinets.', 'A full suite of Whirlpool stainless steel appliances including refrigerator with icemaker, dishwasher, gas stove and microwave, and an extra deep Houzer sink with Grohe faucet.', 'A washer and dryer is available in every residence.', 'Wine chillers are offered in select units.', 'Chic and modern design with Kohler bathtubs and medicine cabinets, Grohe faucet and shower fixtures, white quartz countertops, and oak vanities.', "Indoor Amenities 50 foot swimming pool with his and hers looker rooms State-of-the-art gym with yoga studio Resident's lounge with library, billiards table, catering kitchen, fireplace and widescreen TVs Children's playroom Indoor bicycle parking Residential storage units Outdoor Amenities 25,000 square foot landscaped oceanfront sundeck Movie theater Putting green, bocce court, and children's play Giant chess and checkers Outdoor kitchen and BBQs Telescopes to view the horizon Private outdoor spaces available in select units Services 24-hour attended lobby with valet and concierge service Nearly all residences have direct water view Trolley service to public transit (MTA D/F/N/Q) and New York City's proposed ferry service Attended parking garage Grocery and pharmacy on-site Pet friendly building NET PRICE ADVERTISED", 'Located in the heart of Coney Island.', 'Coney Island has drawn thrill-seekers and locals to its restaurants, bars and boardwalk for well over a century.', 'It’s also the birthplace of two great American traditions: the hot dog and the amusement park.', 'There’s no shortage of places to eat or have fun!', 'With an annual series of events and festivals, there’s no wonder why Coney Island is held in the hearts of New Yorkers of all ages.', 'Coney Island is enjoying a major cultural revival, thanks to the filmmakers, artists and entertainers who’ve helped lead the way.', 'For a private showing please call/text Sherries at 929-320-1735 or you can email me at <URL>',
